Intervention: • Nipple reconstruction: Biodesign® nipple reconstruction cylinder
Eligibility: The patient has a history of breast cancer, having already completed the removal and reconstruction of the unilateral or bilateral breast.
The patient has a desire for the reconstruction of the nipple
The patient is at least 18 years of age.
The patient is not medically fit for surgery under local anaesthesia.
Currently, the patient smokes, uses tobacco or nicotine products (patch, gum or nasal spray).
The patient is pregnant, breast-feeding or is planning to become pregnant later during the study period.
The patient suffers from physical allergies or cultural objections to receiving pig products.
Results: Percentage projection of nipple at 12 months from baseline (1 week after procedure)
Title of the arm/group: Nipple reconstruction cylinder
Description of the arm/group : Nipple reconstruction : Biodesign nipple reconstruction cylinder
Type of units Analysis: Nipples Average (standard deviation)Unity of measurement: percentage of projection against baseline: 37.3 (17.5)
